name: Raining Tacos
description:
★★★ The Official Game of the hit song by Parry Gripp! ★★★

Open your mouth and close your eyes - it's raining tacos! Eat them up while dodging all the chaos!  Can you last longer and gobble more tacos than your friends? Will you become the taco champ?  Who will want to sit next to you in small enclosed spaces afterwards?!  Only one way to find out.. play this super fun game!

Features:
• Select from the original song or an all-new, never-before-heard instrumental version!
• Addictive gameplay!
• Get the awesome song stuck in your head for weeks!
